<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Merfolk Wavecaller](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3098)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Merfolk wavecallers use their primal magic to defend their people. Their ability to asphyxiate airbreathers makes them crucial when surface dwellers invade.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Merfolk_Wavecaller.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Merfolk Wavecaller](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3098)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Amphibious" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=529" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
<trait label="Merfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=761" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 231 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +8; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=69)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Thalassic](/Languages.aspx?ID=113)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +6, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +8, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +2

**Con** +0

**Int** +1

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +6 

**Will** +10 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 30

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 5 feet, swim 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 piercing

**Primal Prepared Spells** DC 18, attack +10
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Electric Arc](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [Frostbite](/Spells.aspx?ID=1539), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307)
- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Hydraulic Push](/Spells.aspx?ID=154)

**Hydraulic Asphyxiation** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165)) **Requirements** The target is fully submerged in water, within 30 feet of the merfolk wavecaller, and [holding its breath](/Rules.aspx?ID=468); **Effect** The merfolk wavecaller commands the tides to crush their foe's throat, rooting the target in place and forcing it to choke up precious air. The target must succeed at a DC 18 Fortitude save or become [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=81) for 1 round and immediately lose 1d4 rounds' worth of air (or twice that on a critical failure).

</column>
